typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test1
source(output(
		ID as string,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> test3
SurrogateKey1, test3 exists(DerivedColumn1@voornaam == test3@voornaam,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'right')~> Exists1
test1 derive(voornaam = voornaam + ' ' + achternaam) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1546L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['DELETE FROM [dz].[test1] WHERE ID = 3 '],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
